casebody.data:
Joe LONDON v. Robert RAINS, Acting Warden, Oklahoma State Penitentiary. No. 6139. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Sept. 12, 1959. Arthur J. Kane, Jr., Denver, Colo., and Morris G. Gray, Okmulgee, Okl,, for appellant. Mac Q. Williamson, Atty. Gen., of Oklahoma, and Mr. Owen J. Watts, Asst. Atty. Gen., of Oklahoma, for appellee.

Before BRATTON, LEWIS and BREITENSTEIN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed without written opinion.
